name: peace ear warmer
notes:
the peace ear warmer is a cozy and stylish knit ear warmer pattern designed to complement the [peace beanie][1] and [peace cowl][2]. perfect for chilly days when you want to keep your ears warm while wearing your hair up, this ear warmer is both functional and fashionable.

knit with [premier anti-pilling bamboo chunky yarn (affiliate link)][3], it’s soft, durable, and available in child, adult small, and adult large sizes. the textured design matches the peace set, making it great for coordinated winter accessories.

whether you’re looking for a quick-knit gift or a versatile winter staple, this pattern is ideal for beginners and experienced knitters alike.

**yarn**: [premier anti-pilling bamboo chunky (affiliate link)][4] (or similar bulky weight yarn)

**needles**: us size 10 (6.0 mm)

**sizes**: child, adult small, adult large

**craft:** knitting

**category:** headwear → ear warmer

**attributes:**
quick and easy
three sizes
matching set option ([peace beanie][5] and [peace cowl][6])

get the pattern [here][7]


  [1]: https://amandammorse.com/chunky-knit-beanie-pattern-peace-beanie/
  [2]: https://amandammorse.com/peace-cowl-free-knitting-pattern/
  [3]: http://premier-yarns.pxf.io/6eb11e
  [4]: http://premier-yarns.pxf.io/6eb11e
  [5]: https://amandammorse.com/chunky-knit-beanie-pattern-peace-beanie/
  [6]: https://amandammorse.com/peace-cowl-free-knitting-pattern/
  [7]: https://amandammorse.com/the-peace-knit-ear-warmer-pattern/
